疊.definition: to fold; to fold over in layers; to furl; to layer; to pile up; to repeat; to duplicate

疊加.definition: to superimpose; to layer; to overlay; to superpose

疊合.definition: to overlay; to superpose; to superimpose; to overlap

疊層.definition: repeated layers; stratified; laminated; stacked; piled strata

疊彩.definition: Diecai district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi

疊彩區.definition: Diecai district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi

疊放.definition: to stack; to lay one on top of another
